lead_paragraph: GAINES--Richard, Ph.D.,68, born in NYC, died in Ramsey, N.J., after a long illness. Devoted husband and best friend of Pamela Poppalardo. Adoring father of Simon and Madeleine. Cousin of Earl Wasserman and Eileen Corbin. Beloved brother-in-law of Jacqueline and Wayne and fond "uncle" to their children and grandchildren. A highly dedicated psychologist in Ridgewood, N.J., Dr. Gaines initiated the Anxiety Disorders Program at West Bergen Mental Healthcare, where he continued in a training and consulting role until very recently. Dr. Gaines was formerly the director of both the Family Center (child abuse prevention and treatment program) and Child Psychiatry Services at Presbyterian Hospital in NYC, where he reshaped the clinical division and was a respected supervisor and mentor. His friendship and affection, once given, were remarkable in strength, endurance, and expression. He will be missed by many close friends and colleagues. Funeral services will be private. A memorial service will be announced at a later date. In lieu of flowers, please donate to the Anxiety Disorders Program for Children and Youth at West Bergen Mental Healthcare. www.westbergen.org 1/3
